Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters all
values "type" stCourtType values "iType" COURT_TYPE_NBA_STANDARD, COURT_TYPE_FIBA_STANDARD, COURT_TYPE_HIGH_SCHOOL
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "type" then iType = COURT_TYPE_NBA_STANDARD if type = stCourtType[2] then iType = COURT_TYPE_FIBA_STANDARD if type = stCourtType[3] then iType = COURT_TYPE_HIGH_SCHOOL parameters iType = iType else type = stCourtType[1] if iType = COURT_TYPE_FIBA_STANDARD then type = stCourtType[2] if iType = COURT_TYPE_HIGH_SCHOOL then type = stCourtType[3] parameters type = type endif
if bCustomSize then values "A" range [42', ) values "B" range [74', ) values "half_a" range [42'/2, ) values "half_b" range [74'/2, ) else lock "A" lock "B"
if iType = COURT_TYPE_NBA_STANDARD then parameters a=50', b=94' endif
if iType = COURT_TYPE_FIBA_STANDARD then parameters a=15, b=28 endif
if iType = COURT_TYPE_HIGH_SCHOOL then parameters a=50', b=84' endif endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "half_a" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "half_b" then a = 2 * half_a parameters a = a b = 2 * half_b parameters b = b else half_a = a/2 parameters half_a = half_a half_b = b/2 parameters half_b = half_b endif
values{2} "iDet2D" DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED, `Детальный`, DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE, `Простой` values{2} "gs_detlevel_3D_m" DLEV3D_DETAILED, `Детальный`, DLEV3D_SIMPLE, `Простой`, DLEV3D_OFF, `Откл.` values "gs_resol" range [3, ) values "rout_area_x" range [0, ) values "rout_area_y" range [0, )
if gs_cont_pen<=0 then parameters gs_cont_pen=4 if line_cont_pen<=0 then parameters line_cont_pen=4 if gs_fill_pen<=0 then parameters gs_fill_pen=91 if runout_fill_pen<=0 then parameters runout_fill_pen=91 if line_fill_pen<=0 then parameters line_fill_pen=91
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_SIMPLE then lock "gs_resol"
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: gs_detlevel_3D_m DLEV3D_OFF = 0 DLEV3D_SIMPLE = 1 DLEV3D_DETAILED = 2
! const values for parameter: iDet2D DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE = 1 DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED = 2
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Court type integer definitions ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
COURT_TYPE_NBA_STANDARD = 1 COURT_TYPE_FIBA_STANDARD = 2 COURT_TYPE_HIGH_SCHOOL = 3
dim stCourtType[] stCourtType[1] = `Стандарт NBA` stCourtType[2] = `Стандарт FIBA` stCourtType[3] = `Высшая Школа`
